original_text: It is easier for heaven and earth to disappear than for the least stroke of a pen to drop out of the Law.
korean_text: 그러나 율법의 한 획이 떨어짐보다 천지가 없어짐이 쉬우리라

sentences.original_text: It is easier for heaven and earth to disappear
sentences.korean_translation: 하늘과 땅이 없어지는 것이 더 쉽다

sentences.original_text: than for the least stroke of a pen
to drop out of the Law
